# comment: Player nation. 'all' will generate for all nations. Must be lower-case.
Ship type. 'all' will generate for all ship types. Must be lower-case.
Number to generate per nation, per type, per year.
Continue generating until the desired number is reached. This could result in an infinate loop if a nation/class/year combo is impossible to generate.
Default visibility of year selector. This must be set to 1 if year_min/max/list are used.
...to this year in the year selector by default. Leave empty to ignore.
Comma separated list of years to select. Leave empty to ignore.
